title: Castle Hill, Whitton
description: A large villa complex located at Castle Hill, Whitton. This site is considered to be one of the most important villa complexes known in Suffolk. Excavations were conducted in 1929-32, 1946-50 and 1988-9.

properties.description: Location of the modern associated settlement based on a node derived from OpenStreetMap.
properties.title: OSM location of Castle Hill
